programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Maira disappears and Tanya asserts that Armaan and Abhira have run away together, stirring tension in the family. Subsequently, Maira's absence brings back memories of losing Pookie for Abhira. S01 E4855.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Sayali decides to have Manjiri stay at her home. However, she receives no backing from the family and they stand against her decision. S01 E488.

programme.title: Kabhi Neem Neem Kabhi Shahad Shahad
programme.desc: Katha and UV get into a clash, both accusing one another, and she reveals his offenses against her. Subsequently, Rukmini pleads with UV to marry Katha. S01 E38.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupama's group rejoices in their success after winning the selection phase of the dance contest. Subsequently, Jaspreet confronts Anupama about concealing her history. S01 E1709.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
